    Function reference

    rb3 Package

    rb3 rb3-package
    rb3: Download and Parse Public Data Released by B3 Exchange

    Download and Read Marketdata

    read_marketdata()
    Read and parses files delivered by B3
    download_marketdata()
    Download datasets
    convert_to()
    Converts B3 messy files to structured formats

    Templates

    show_templates()
    Show templates.
    display_template()
    Display templates

    Yield Curves

    yc_mget() yc_get() yc_ipca_mget() yc_ipca_get() yc_usd_mget() yc_usd_get()
    Fetches Yield Curve Data from B3

    COTAHIST datasets

    cotahist_get()
    Get COTAHIST data from B3
    cotahist_equity_get() cotahist_bdrs_get() cotahist_units_get() cotahist_etfs_get() cotahist_fiis_get() cotahist_fidcs_get() cotahist_fiagros_get() cotahist_indexes_get() cotahist_equity_options_get() cotahist_index_options_get() cotahist_funds_options_get() cotahist_get_symbols()
    Extract data from COTAHIST dataset

    Indexes

    index_get()
    Get index historical data
    indexes_get()
    Get B3 indexes available
    indexes_last_update()
    Get the date of indexes composition last update
    index_comp_get()
    Get composition of B3 indexes
    index_weights_get()
    Get the assets weights of B3 indexes
    index_by_segment_get()
    Get B3 indexes available
    indexreport_mget() indexreport_get()
    Fetches indexes data from B3

    Companies

    company_cash_dividends_get()
    Gets company's dividents in cash
    company_info_get()
    Gets information about the company
    company_stock_dividends_get()
    Gets company's stocks dividends
    company_subscriptions_get()
    Gets company's subscription rights

    Futures

    futures_mget() futures_get()
    Get futures prices from trading session settlements page
    maturity2date()
    Get maturity date from maturity code
    code2month()
    Get month from maturity code

    CDI rate and IDI index

    cdi_get() idi_get()
    Get CDI rate and IDI index value from B3 front page

    Super datasets (mix datasets)

    yc_superset() yc_usd_superset() yc_ipca_superset()
    Creates superset with yield curves and futures
    cotahist_equity_options_superset() cotahist_options_by_symbol_superset()
    Extracts equity option superset of data

    Cache

    cachedir()
    Returns rb3 package cache directory
    clearcache()
    Clear cache directory
